## page was renamed from Touch/SdkRoadmapStatus
This page documents the status of the planned features to be added to the Ubuntu platform on mobile devices and when they will be accessible via the [[http://developer.ubuntu.com/get-started/|Ubuntu SDK]] for app developers to use it in their applications. It does not constitute the SDK roadmap itself, but it is provided as an overview of the planned features and when they will land.

 * '''Tracking progress''': If you are interested in a particular feature, please subscribe to the corresponding blueprint in the table to get e-mail notifications when the work items update
 * '''Keeping up to date''': To stay up to date about the development of Ubuntu Touch and to ask any questions, [[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-phone|subscribe to the Ubuntu Phone mailing list >]].
